DOC.brief_summary: This study two-part study . Part one design see different formulation GSK364735 absorb body To see food affect GSK364735 absorb body . Part two design see repeat dose affect GSK364735 absorb body .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate Formulations And Food Effect On GSK364735 In Healthy Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : The subject healthy clinically significant problem identify physician . Females nonchildbearing potential male surgically sterile agrees birth control . Body mass Index ( BMI ) 1929.9 ( kg/m2 ) . Exclusion criterion : As result physical examination , lab result Investigator considers subject unfit study . Blood pressure electrocardiogram normal A history alcohol illicit drug abuse . Tobacco use within 3 month . Positive Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C antibody HIV antibody . Current use prescription nonprescription drug , include vitamin , herbal dietary supplement . Has participate clinical trial within 30 day prior first dose study medication . Donated pint blood within 56 day period . History allergy study drug .
